title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Best of The Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the NBA Draft. Which team had the best night? Nets studio host Frank Isola calls in to discuss Kyrie's future in Brooklyn. And Texas Columnist Kirk Bohls explains what the Arch Manning commitment means for the Longhorns

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
